name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Product Designer, I possess a robust skill set in **User Experience Design**, **UX Design Fundamentals**, and innovative **Prototyping** techniques, leveraging tools like **Figma** and **3D Visualization Tools** to enhance human-machine interaction. With over 9 years of experience in creating intuitive designs that prioritize user satisfaction, I excel in collaboration and communication within cross-functional teams. My strong attention to detail ensures the delivery of high-quality, safety-critical UX solutions, while my background in **Electrical Engineering** and **Microcontrollers** informs my approach to industrial design challenges.

experience.responsibilities:
• Focus on **User Experience Design** by leading the design process for key services within Java cloud-based applications.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate **Human-Machine Interaction** principles into product designs, ensuring optimal usability and user engagement.
• Utilize **Prototyping** techniques alongside tools like **Figma** to develop early-stage designs and gather user feedback, implementing changes to enhance **Visual Design**.
• Emphasize **Attention to Detail** in the creation of Hybrid-single Page Applications using **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **React 17**, and **Redux 4.2.1**.
• Design and enhance responsive user interfaces employing **Angular 14**, **HTML5**, **CSS**, and **Bootstrap**, achieving a user satisfaction rating of over 90% in feedback surveys.
• Implement **Front-end Frameworks** to streamline UI development, ensuring application performance through **Node.js** and **MongoDB** for efficient data handling.
• Experience in working with **RDBMS** technologies such as **Oracle**, **MySQL**, **MS SQL**, and **PostgreSQL**, optimizing database queries for applications with over 1,000 daily active users.
• Automate deployment processes using **Docker**, **Jenkins**, and **Ansible**, reducing deployment times by 30% and increasing reliability in staging and production environments.

• Focus on User Experience Design by creating intuitive and engaging web applications using **React 12** and **Angular 12, 13**.
• Apply UX Design Fundamentals and Visual Design principles while developing dynamic, multi-browser compatible web pages with **HTML5**, **CSS3**, **JavaScript**, and **AJAX**.
• Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on project goals and improve Human-Machine Interaction.
• Utilize **Figma** for prototyping and crafting visually appealing designs that enhance user satisfaction and engagement.
• Leverage attention to detail in creating reusable modules and custom directives, effectively enhancing development efficiency across the application.
• Implement safety-critical UX strategies to ensure applications meet industry standards, particularly when working with **Microcontrollers** in electrical engineering projects.
• Maintain strong communication skills to articulate design ideas and gather feedback, fostering a collaborative working environment.
• Designed and implemented the Model View Controller (MVC) architecture using **Spring MVC** framework.
• Developed REST APIs using **Spring Boot** for Microservices, improving application scalability and performance.
• Integrated dynamic dashboards with **ChartJS**, enhancing data visualization capabilities of the web application.
• Developed web applications with real-time features through implementing **Web Sockets**, maintaining robust bidirectional communication.

- Enhanced **User Experience Design** by developing responsive web applications using **Spring MVC**, **jQuery**, **HTML**, **JavaScript**, **CSS**, **Material UI**, and **Tailwind CSS**.
- Leveraged **Figma** to convert high-fidelity designs into interactive prototypes, ensuring a seamless transition from design to development.
- Utilized user interface controls implemented with **jQuery** for effective **Human-Machine Interaction** and client-side validation, improving usability by **25%**.
- Developed REST services using **Node.js** and **Express**, successfully implementing CORS, which improved data accessibility and cross-domain requests by **30%**.
- Collaborated on designing **SSIS** packages for efficient data export, achieving data transfer rates up to **10MB/s** from flat file sources to **MS SQL Server**.
- Gained proficiency in various web technologies, including **Bower**, **NPM**, **Git**, and optimized deployment processes on cloud platforms like **AWS**, **Azure**, **GCP**, and **Heroku**, enhancing overall application performance by **15%**.
- Demonstrated strong **Communication Skills** and **Collaboration** abilities while working in cross-functional teams, ensuring alignment across project goals and timelines.
- Applied meticulous **Attention to Detail** in the conversion of Photoshop and Figma designs into table-less semantic **XHTML** and CSS, enhancing page load times by **20%**.
